When exporting a document you want to define your own layout. Documents which are created via an word import save their document style but documents created inside of Polarion are using a standard Polarion format. We want to change this format so you can add your company guidelines.
  • Open Administration>Work Items>Round-trip Template
  • Save global Configuration roundtrip.docx on you desktop and open it in MS Word
  • Replace Polarion Logo with your own company logo
  • Remove Product Version variable from document footer
  • Add following variables to document header
    • updatedBy
      • you have to make the developer tools visible via File>Options>Customize Menu> activate checkmark for developer tools
      • (Word 2013 English) File>Options>Customize Ribbon.Â  Select checkmark for "Developer"
      • for inserting a variable enter go to the document header, open the developer tools tab, select design mode, add a ("plain text") text only element (next to design mode) and select properties in the new field.

  • Upload your changed template and verify your template is working as expected
